meanings.definition: A type of fish that can inflate itself into a round shape as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent1: The globefish puffed up to protect itself from predators.
meanings.sent2: I saw a globefish at the aquarium puffing up when it felt threatened.
meanings.sent3: The globefish looked like a cute round balloon when it inflated.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks puffed out like a globefish when she blew up the balloon.
meanings.sent5: The globefish's ability to inflate makes it unique among other fish.

meanings.definition: To puff up or swell like a globefish.
meanings.sent1: She had to globefish her cheeks to imitate the fish for the school play.
meanings.sent2: The balloon started to globefish as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent3: He tried to globefish his ego by boasting about his achievements.
meanings.sent4: The situation made her heart globefish with pride.
meanings.sent5: The flower globefished as it absorbed water, becoming more vibrant.
